channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Keyword Meta
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Keyword Meta

item.title: CVE-2021-24611|2024-08-03T19:35:20.209Z -- unknown -- keyword%20meta
item.description: The Keyword Meta WordPress plugin through 3.0 does not sanitise of escape its settings before outputting them back in the page after they are saved, allowing for Cross-Site Scripting issues. Furthermore, it is also lacking any CSRF check, allowing attacker to make a logged in high privilege user save arbitrary setting via a CSRF attack.
